greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest common divisor of product (1+(p^e)) and product (1+p), where p ranges over prime factors of n, with e corresponding exponent; a(n) = gcd(A034448(n), A048250(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: A034448(n) = { my(f=factorint(n)); prod(k=1, #f~, 1+(f[k, 1]^f[k, 2])); }; \\ After code in A034448
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2019
